attributes.action: Investigation of the HMCTS for misconduct and perverting the course of justice NO WARRANT.
attributes.additional_details:
A Full CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION is requested of the HMCTS for use of UNCERTIFIED BAILIFF without WARRANT who ASSAULTS. Committing FRAUD.

Contrary to the county court act 1984.
section 135/136.( UNCERTIFIED BAILIFF) claims to be certified.

Courts abuse of power.

Criminal offence under section 40 (1)(d) of the administration of justice act 1970. To make counterfeit court document and present it as a real document.
Bailiff refused to leave... HOWELL  V  JACKSON [1834] 6 c&p 723.
Conspiracy to commit FRAUD.
Fraud act 2006. section 2,3,4,6,7,10,12.
Liability of company officers.

Not following the complaints procedure.
